text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Some time has passed since we<n>began training in earnest,
and the date<n>of Sky's debut race has finally been<n>decided.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Woo hoo! At last—the Twinkle Series!Even I'm getting a bit excited.Let's keep up the hard work!
choice_data_list: Jokes aside, let's come up with a plan.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haha. I see you've gotten used to<n>handling me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
But I get your point. After all, the key<n>to a good fishing trip is
preparing<n>quality bait. On that note... let's go for<n>a walk!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Yup. A good idea isn't just gonna<n>pop into your head by
racking it for<n>answers, is it? Instead, why don't we<n>go
bask beneath the warm sun?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Who knows? Maybe we'll hear<n>some useful info, or get
some<n>unexpected inspiration along the way.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, Sky and I begin aimlessly<n>strolling around campus.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
K-King, check out the program for my<n>next race! It has the
running styles of<n>all my competitors listed on it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Is this the latest in precognitive<n>technology?! The city
sure is amaz'n!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Um, that's not quite right. That<n>document only shows
predictions<n>based on information from previous<n>races
they've entered.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Really?! I-I had no idea!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
The race program, huh? Forgot about<n>that. Based on my
previous races, I'll<n>bet "front-runner" is listed next to my<n>
name.
choice_data_list: Yeah. That gives me an idea...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Trainer, that's your scheming<n>face, isn't it? Did you
come up with<n>something just now?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
We're doing scrimmages every<n>day?! Against the
opponents in my<n>debut race?! And you want me to run<n>in
them as a late surger instead of a<n>front-runner?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Now, hold up a second! The odds of<n>that working are about
as good as me<n>showing up to practice on time!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: What. Did. You. Say?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
This is horrible! This is tyranny! I<n>can't race under these
conditions! I'll<n>lose my motivation long before I even<n>
finish!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...Huh. Hm, you're up to something,<n>aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Fiiine, not like I have a choice! You<n>win, okay? I'll do it!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: In exchange... you'll make sure I reel<n>it in, won't you?

Sky spends the next few days<n>scrimmaging against the
opponents of<n>her upcoming debut race.

text_block_list.name: Rival Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... I'm surprised, Sky.Are you really going to race as a latesurger?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Well, I guess I'm starting to think it's<n>not so bad? I mean, it
feels kinda cool<n>bursting into the lead during the final<n>
stretch!

text_block_list.name: Rival Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You're not wrong... But you haven't<n>been able to steal the
lead even once,<n>you know? You keep running out of<n>
stamina.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
And therein lies the rub. That's my<n>homework. As you can
see, my<n>stamina isn't anything worth writing<n>home
about... Hehe.

Slowly but surely, a certain rumor<n>begins spreading around
the<n>academy.

"Seiun Sky is going to race as a late<n>surger, but her stamina
is her biggest<n>weakness."

With even the race program now<n>listing her as a late surger,
the day of<n>her debut race finally arrives!
Bang!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And the runners are out of the gate,<n>each of them
up-and-coming runners<n>vying for glory in their debut race!<n>
Leading in first is...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
S-Seiun Sky! It's Seiun Sky with the<n>lead! She's running at
full throttle,<n>leaving second far behind in the dust!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky is front-running?! Wasn't<n>she supposed to be a
late surger?!<n>Did the debut race nerves get to her?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
A desperate dash... Par for the course<n>for a rookie. Guess
that's one less<n>competitor to watch for. It seems the<n>other
racers have come to the same<n>conclusion.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Besides, Sky's biggest weakness is<n>her lack of stamina.
There's no way<n>she can keep this pace through to the<n>
end.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That's what you'd think, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
All my stamina training was actually<n>so I could keep up this
"desperate<n>dash."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
And then... before I knew it, this<n>became my normal
front-running pace.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The racers have rounded the third<n>corner! Seiun Sky is
showing no signs<n>of slowing down!

text_block_list.name: Spectating Trainers
text_block_list.text: Whaaaaat?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: (Haha, that's what I like to hear!)

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
(The body you're born with decides<n>everything? Your
talents? Your<n>pedigree? Nah, that's all so boring.)

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: (Races are fun because none of that<n>matters!)

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... You all took the bait!Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky is flying down the final<n>stretch! This is textbook
front-running!<n>What an upset! With a five-length<n>lead, this
race is finished!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Man, did you hear that, Trainer?<n>Instead of commotion,
there's<n>confusion! Instead of cheers, there<n>are shrieks! I
can't get enough of this!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...Now this is how a race ought tobe. You get it, and I respect that.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Sooo, what's our next big catch?<n>With you by my side,
winning 'em all<n>might not be a pipe dream anym—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Stooooop right there! I won't let that<n>happen!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whoa?! King and Spe... You both came<n>to watch?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yup, we saw everything! Congrats on<n>first!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You're really amazing. But I'm not<n>gonna lose to you!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Exactly! Next time, you will have a<n>first-rate opponent—me! l
shall give<n>you the right to suffer utter defeat at<n>my hands.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hm... That sounds like a real chore.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But, well... the larger the catch, the<n>more reason to reel it in.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Isn't that right, Trainer?

And so, I embark with Seiun Sky on a<n>voyage across the
vast sea of racing,<n>searching for our next big catch.
